ComicInfo.Summary:
Middle grade readers can get tangled up in these all-new adventures of Spider-Man and his amazing friends! Peter, Miles, and Gwen have completed their internships at the Daily Bugle-now they're all shook up over their newest foe-the Shocker! A Marvelous new era continues!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Fico Ossio | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Sanford Greene | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 08:08:08. [CVDB741395]
ComicInfo.Editor: Chase Marotz, Elizabeth Brei, Riley Farmer
ComicInfo.Characters: Gwen Stacy, Harry Osborn, Jefferson Davis, Miles Morales, Shocker, Spider-Man
ComicInfo.Locations: Alphabet City, Brooklyn, New York City
